name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a results-driven Senior Civil Engineer, I possess extensive experience in regulatory compliance and cross-functional project management, with a strong emphasis on continuous improvement and collaboration in all phases of product development. My background includes developing innovative solutions utilizing **AI** for enhancing sewer inspection processes, ensuring adherence to industry regulations. I excel in fostering a data-driven culture within project teams, which boosts efficiency and productivity. 
With over 8 years as a Full Stack Developer, I have honed my technical expertise in **JavaScript**/ **TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My comprehensive experience spans **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, along with a strong foundation in **Azure** and **AWS** cloud services. I have successfully led the creation of enterprise-grade platforms that integrate AI/ML capabilities, focusing on predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and real-time data processing, while ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
